name: Kyan Kyan Collection
overview: Kyan Kyan Collection is a computer adaptation of the Japanese card game Daifugō / Daihinmin (known in English-speaking countries as Scum, President, and other names). The objective of the game is to get rid of all cards dealt to the player by progressively playing higher cards one at a turn. The player competes against four AI-controlled female opponents. Although all four participate in every round, the player must select one of the girls in the beginning of the game as the main adversary. Her picture will be displayed during the rounds and she will gradually undress as she loses.
